DOC.brief_summary: Three purpose of this study: 1. Increase diagnosis rate and formulate the flow of diagnosis and treatment of AF in ischemic stroke patients; 2. Evaluation on specificity and sensitivity of STAF score; 3. Analyze the pathogenesis of ischemic stroke and risk factors and establish clinical database and sample database of ischemic stroke.
DOC.brief_title: China Atrial Fibrillation Screening in Acute Ischemic Stroke Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criteria: 1. Hospitalized patients with ischemic stroke that are diagnosed definitely; 2. Age ≥ 18 years; 3. Within 7 days after the onset of diseases; 4. Signed the consent informed form. Exclusion criteria: 1. Patients with noncerebrovascular diseases that are diagnosed definitely; 2. Silent cerebral infarction (CI) without symptoms and signs; 3. Those refuse to sign the consent informed form of the study.
